channel.title: MCMC on ISNET Series Website
channel.description: Recent content in MCMC on ISNET Series Website

item.title: Basics
item.description: This section is concerned with all things Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) relevant to ISNET topics. Learn what is MCMC, how to use it, and popular computing packages to perform sampling on your problem.

item.title: Computing resources
item.description: This page links to relevant computing resources for MCMC and has some discussion of how they are useful.

item.title: Advanced topics
item.description: This page is for cutting edge MCMC topics beyond getting started and what package to use for sampling. s
